靜一靜.definition: to put sth to rest; calm down a bit!

靜區.definition: silent zone; blind spot; dead space

靜坐.definition: to sit quietly; to meditate; to stage a sit-in

靜坐不動.definition: to sit still and do nothing; to sit tight

靜坐不能.definition: akathisia (condition of restlessness, a side-effect of neuroleptic antipsychotic drug); unable to sit still; hyperactivity; restlessness

靜坐抗議示威.pinyin: jìng zuò kàng yì shì wēi

靜寧.definition: Jingning county in Pingliang 平涼|平凉[Ping2 liang2], Gansu

靜寧縣.definition: Jingning county in Pingliang 平涼|平凉[Ping2 liang2], Gansu

靜山.definition: Cheng San (precinct in Ang Mo Kio, Singapore); Cheng Shan GRC, formerly (until the 1997 elections) a group representation constituency (electoral division) in Singapore

靜岡縣.definition: Shizuoka prefecture southwest of Tokyo, Japan

靜態.definition: static; sedate; quiet; passive; (physics) static; steady-state; (electronics) quiescent

靜樂.definition: Jingle county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

靜樂縣.definition: Jingle county in Xinzhou 忻州[Xin1 zhou1], Shanxi

靜海.definition: Jinghai, a district of Tianjin 天津[Tian1jin1]; Sea of Tranquility (lunar feature)

靜養.definition: to convalesce; to recuperate; to fully relax

靜默.definition: silent; still; quiet; to mourn in silence; to observe silence; (neologism c. 2022) to stay at home during a pandemic
